short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the movies of your choice with El Toro!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This page extension add a button to the address bar when visiting the site imdb.com. Pick a movie, press the El Toro button and a google search with further information shows up in your browser.
